cf.BoundedVariable.isperiodic¶

BoundedVariable.isperiodic¶

New in version 2.0.

>>> print c.period()
None
>>> c.isperiodic
False
>>> c.period(cf.Data(360, 'degeres_east'))
None
>>> c.isperiodic
True
>>> c.period(None)
<CF Data: 360 degrees_east>
>>> c.isperiodic
False
